    • Constructor Detail

      • Settings

        public Settings(java.lang.String appToken)
        Initializes a settings object with the given app token.
        Parameters:
        appToken - A valid app token retrieved from the Smooch web portal.

    • Method Detail

      • getAppToken

        public java.lang.String getAppToken()
        The app token corresponding to your application.

        App tokens are issued on the Smooch web portal. This value may only be set once, and must be set at init time.

        Returns:
        The app token

      • isFirebaseCloudMessagingAutoRegistrationEnabled

        public boolean isFirebaseCloudMessagingAutoRegistrationEnabled()
        A boolean property that indicates whether Smooch should manage the Firebase Cloud Messaging registration.

        The default value is true.

        Returns:
        Is Firebase Cloud Messaging auto registration enabled

      • setFirebaseCloudMessagingAutoRegistrationEnabled

        public void setFirebaseCloudMessagingAutoRegistrationEnabled(boolean firebaseCloudMessagingAutoRegistrationEnabled)
        A boolean property that indicates whether Smooch should manage the Firebase Cloud Messaging registration.

        The default value is true.

        Parameters:
        firebaseCloudMessagingAutoRegistrationEnabled - Is Firebase Cloud Messaging auto registration enabled

      • getFileProviderAuthorities

        public java.lang.String getFileProviderAuthorities()
        A String that signifies which authority Smooch will use to provide files to the CAMERA application.

        This need only be set when you have a provider defined in the AndroidManifest.

        Returns:
        The authorities string.

      • setFileProviderAuthorities

        public void setFileProviderAuthorities(java.lang.String fileProviderAuthorities)
        A String that signifies which authority Smooch will use to provide files to the CAMERA application.

        This need only be set when you have a provider defined in the AndroidManifest.

        Parameters:
        fileProviderAuthorities - The authorities string set in your provider tag

      • getJWT

        public java.lang.String getJWT()
        The JSON web token used to secure calls to Smooch

        The default value is empty string.

        Returns:
        The JWT.

      • setJWT

        public void setJWT(java.lang.String jwt)
        The JSON web token used to secure calls to Smooch

        The default value is empty string.

        Parameters:
        jwt - The JWT.

      • getUserId

        public java.lang.String getUserId()
        The User ID used to identify the user

        The default value is empty string.

        Returns:
        The User ID.

      • setUserId

        public void setUserId(java.lang.String userId)
        The User ID used to identify the user

        The default value is empty string.

        Parameters:
        userId - The User ID.
